title: Spotted in the Algarve: Jonas Vingegaard Rides 150mm Cranks, Primož Roglič Rocks Hairy Legs
content:
Vingegaard and Visma-Lease a Bike up the stakes in the crank 'arms race' after Pogačar switched down to a 165mm set-up for his blockbuster 2024 season.

Read the full article at Spotted in the Algarve: Jonas Vingegaard Rides 150mm Cranks, Primož Roglič Rocks Hairy Legs on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
